transfer_memos.whitelist_only: This bot is for community members only. Please contact the community leaders to get added to the whitelist in order to join.
transfer_memos.member_valid_thru: Membership updated for @{to}. Membership valid through: {tag}.
transfer_memos.member_full_delegation: Membership updated for @{to}. Full amount delegated, membership is valid indefinitely while delegation remains.
